name: I have a gun.
description:
A story about the nuances of green and red, set in a post-apocalypse. 

NOTE: This story is currently in a DEMO state, meaning that only the prologue is available to play. Subsequent chapters are currently in development.

Now, enter the Cognitive Amplitude Matrix and steer this hapless man toward his fate.

Else, our very own fates will exhibit far more abhorrent consequences.
